forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. High near 10C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy this evening with showers after midnight. Low 7C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then off and on rain showers overnight. Low 46F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High near 50F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.
